## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description            | Type                                                                                            | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `as`     | `as`      | The HTML tag to render | `"h1" \| "h2" \| "h3" \| "h4" \| "h5" \| "h6" \| "p" \| "span"`                                 | `'p'`     |
| `color`  | `color`   | The color of the text  | `"danger" \| "dark" \| "info" \| "light" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'light'` |
